data.text: @MSaippa @KYcodilehunter @VisceralVenom @enews It's not just Eliza who have accused Joel, there are 2 other women now. And at the time she told her mother, her on-set guardian and her big brother. You've got to use your discretion and judgement. It is extremely unlikely he is innocent with those factors against him.
@KYcodilehunter @VisceralVenom @enews Apples

@KYcodilehunter @VisceralVenom @enews I think as a man if you flirt with a woman and she becomea unconfortable it.  She can lable it harrassment. That's what's happening and it's unfair. It's unfair to the innocent men and the innocent victims. All I'm saying is there are a few bad applea

@KYcodilehunter @VisceralVenom @enews These woman have a voice. And claim they are powerful woman but can't say no? Some woman actually do say no and they are physically unable to get away. Those are the victims we should be listening too

@KYcodilehunter @VisceralVenom @enews The bigger question is why do we immidiately assume guilty. I thought it was "innocent until proven guilty" and some of these woman werent assulted they said so themselves by stating they were reluctant but decided to go along with it.  That's not sexual harrassment.
@MSaippa @VisceralVenom @enews And why do you assume that?
@KYcodilehunter @VisceralVenom @enews Its more about innocent until proven guilty. The ones who are lying are ruining it for the victims. I believe some if these woman are lying.
@MSaippa @VisceralVenom @enews Imagine everyone not believing you if something happened to you. Have some damn perspective.
@VisceralVenom @enews Got something to tell us, Vincent?
@MSaippa @VisceralVenom @enews I'm guessing you haven't been a victim .

@VisceralVenom @enews True, they should be forced to show proof of some kind rather than just saying something and destroying a man. Before people get all butt hurt think about the shit this guy is going through if this wasn't true
@VisceralVenom @enews I believe you're a disgusting piece of shit.
@VisceralVenom @enews Someone should probably look into your past... https://t.co/aSUAmmuoqC
@enews Of course he denies. What, when did any of these attackers ever say Yep i did that. I hope his career is over, as he thinks.

@enews You are strong lady no matter when it happened you make sure he paid for his crime. He will denie the allegation of course. No criminal will admit that he did the crime. I will go old way Hang Him High. Good luck I with you.
@VisceralVenom @enews I agree! This is turning into the salem witch trials
@enews MISSY, I didn’t know you were still alive.
@enews Sexual assault is a dangerous ground to give an opinion on, therefore im leaving out my opinion. Instead i have a question. Why now? Whats going on this world? Accusations after accusations
@enews You are so strong and brave Eliza for speaking out
